prop1.title: Land Acquisition Strategy
prop1.description: Strategic decisions regarding land acquisition for the OHA community development project.

questions.title: Should OHA purchase the 50-acre farm in Mazowe?
questions.description: We have identified a 50-acre privately owned farm in Mazowe, approximately 45 minutes from Harare. The property has clean title deeds, good road access, and potential for subdivision.

prop2.title: Membership Fee Structure
prop2.description: Financial structure and fee adjustments for OHA membership.

questions.title: What should be the annual membership fee?
questions.description: Due to increased legal and administrative costs, we need to adjust membership fees.

admin1.title: Administrative Document Signing Process
admin1.description: Modernizing our administrative processes for document signing and approval workflows.

questions.title: Which document signing method should OHA adopt?
questions.description: Choose the primary method for securing signatures on administrative documents.

options.label: Hybrid Approach
options.description: Use both methods based on document type

questions.title: Who should handle emergency document signing?
questions.description: During the Coordinator's travel to Zimbabwe, who should handle urgent document signing?

options.label: Richards Inc Attorneys
options.description: Direct to law firm for assembly

website1.title: Website Development Strategy
website1.description: Strategic decisions for website development and member engagement platform.

questions.title: Should website development proceed despite committee restructuring?
questions.description: Decide whether to prioritize website development over planned committee changes.

options.label: Wait for Restructuring
options.description: Pause until committee changes are complete

questions.title: Which members should participate in website development?
questions.description: Determine the criteria for member participation in the website project.

options.label: Paid Members Only
options.description: Only members who have paid commitment fees

marketing1.title: Marketing and Outreach Strategy
marketing1.description: Comprehensive marketing strategy to attract new members and promote OHA.

questions.title: What should be our primary marketing approach?
questions.description: Choose the main strategy for attracting new members to OHA.

options.label: Digital Marketing
options.description: Focus on social media and online presence

questions.title: What marketing materials should we prioritize?
questions.description: Select the most important marketing materials to develop first.

legal1.title: Legal Counsel Selection
legal1.description: Selection of legal counsel for group land buying and property transactions.

questions.title: Which law firm should OHA engage for group land buying?
questions.description: Select the legal counsel for our land acquisition activities.

options.label: Law firm of Mr Maposa
options.description: Has existing knowledge on group buying

questions.title: How should we conduct due diligence on law firms?
questions.description: Determine the process for evaluating potential legal counsel.

options.label: Member Voting
options.description: All members vote after individual research
